tdmtpy.tensor.Tensor.cartesian_to_spherical¶

Tensor.cartesian_to_spherical()[source]¶

Conversion from cartesian coordinates to spherical coordinates

A function that converts moment tensor elements from attribute m to GCMT format and assigns the vector of tensor elements (mrr, mtt, mpp, mrt, mrp, mtp) to attribute cmt.

Conversion is defined by:

Mrr=Mzz, Mtt=Mxx, Mpp=Myy, Mrt=Mxz, Mrp=-Myz, Mtp=-Mxy,

where x, y, z equal to north, east, down (Aki and Richards, 2002).
